backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles, hydration settings, and daily intake logs with access control and per‑principal storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile setup, reminders, history, settings, and intake tracking UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/history/EmptySta: Empty history placeholder encouraging users to start logging intake.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Displays a 7‑day water intake history with averages, progress bars, and goal indicators, using fetched history and settings data.
frontend/src/components/intake/QuickAddI: Provides quick-add and custom input options to log water intake using preset amounts or a user-entered value.
frontend/src/components/intake/TodayProg: Shows today's water intake progress toward the daily goal with a progress bar and goal status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with branding, user greeting, and a login button.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays a dismissible in-app hydration reminder banner when triggered by the scheduler.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Offers controls to enable notifications and start or pause hydration reminders, showing permission and reminder status.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Provides a form to view and update hydration settings like daily goal and cup size with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposes login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, settings, intake data, and hydration history through an actor API.
Implements a reminder scheduler using notifications or in-app prompts with start, pause, and permission handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom hydration-themed color variables and dark mode definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and theming using OKLCH variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, required images, implemented features, and pending feature requests for a water drinking reminder app. Serves as a central config and progress record for planning and development.
